availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Thomas (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, saddler)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, saddler apprentice. Kentucky native. Son of David Thomas and Mary Thomas. Resident of Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1850. Saddler apprentice in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, District 1, p. 45A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 788.
"E. P. Thomas (1846 - 1934)," Find A Grave, Memorial 125830451, accessed January 11, 2019, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/125830451.
